overview: Bad little Miss Kitty Kat and her band of sexy little pussy's are trying to suck the male population of Skancino into oblivion by sexing them up and then turning them into stuffed animals? What?! Well, anyhow, the perilous male heroes of the story are put to the test by these naughty little pussies! Will Miss Kitty Kat's plan be foiled? The C-Men are gonna 'X-plode' these bad pussies into the netherworld!
tagline: It's a plot to destroy planet Earth! (Hey, at least there's a plot!)
title: C-Men
